system.description:
A plain-looking black cloak which can grant the power of flight to the wearer.

  • Command word: Upon speaking the correct command word, the cloak transforms into a pair of great bat wings (20’ wingspan), allowing the wearer to fly for a limited period.

  • Movement rate: 360’ (120’) for up to 2 turns, 180’ (60’) for up to 4 turns, or 120’ (40’) for up to 8 turns.

  • Load: The character can fly with up to their normal maximum load.

  • Rest: Following a flight of the maximum number of turns listed above, the character must lay down and rest for 6 turns. Shorter flights require the character to rest proportionally less (e.g. a flight at the fastest rate for 1 turn requires 3 turns of rest).

  • Usage frequency: Up to once per day.
